overview: Professor Saad seeks to be a novelist but all his attempts to write a novel fail. His wife, Suhair, always complains of his inability to write. Suddenly, he receives a message from his cousin, the immigrant millionaire, announcing that he will travel and visit. Sohair and Saad are plotting to make Shaukat give them some of his money, are they successful?
title: مسرحية انا وهى وسموه
